metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24975 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The --mirror documentation for Git through 2.35.1 does not mention the availability of deleted content, aka the "GitBleed" issue. This could present a security risk if information-disclosure auditing processes rely on a clone operation without the --mirror option.

notes.Note: eslerm> --mirror appears to work as intended and clearly documents that all refs are copied (which includes deleted branches and git reset data) vendor diputes CVE

criterions.comment: git: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'documentation patch only').
